e4: I recommend changing to the new policy because it aligns with ethical standards of transparency and honesty in financial reporting. While there may be short-term confusion among some investors, establishing a consistent and unbiased reporting practice will enhance the company's credibility and minimize potential legal risks, ultimately benefiting all stakeholders in the long run.
e5: An ethical reporting policy should prioritize transparency, honesty, and accuracy, ensuring that all financial information accurately reflects the company's performance without misleading stakeholders. Additional considerations include the ability of investors to understand and access relevant data, as well as adherence to regulatory requirements. A policy that fosters trust and accountability enhances the firm's reputation and encourages responsible investment.
e6: Yes, I would like to know how the management plans to communicate the change in policy to investors to ensure understanding and confidence. Additionally, it would be helpful to understand the timeline for implementing this new policy and how we will monitor investor reactions to adjust our communication strategy accordingly.
